entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F# program fails with an unprintable exception when `FSharp.Core` is not referenced. #104528
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding methods to the HTTP Client factory that receive Type parameters instead of generic type parameters #104525
  • [browser-wasm] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failure ("Why are we setting the target on an unoccupied slot?") #104524
  • [browser-wasm] PhysicalFileProviderTests test failure #104523
  • Loongarch/riscV: ThreadLocal optimization during JIT should detect static/dynamic resolver #104518

Closed

  • wrong type when creating a generic whith nullable properties and using it with an enum #104526
  • TraceListener.TraceOptions ignores TraceOutputOptions.LogicalOperationStack #23515
    Future
  • Struct with self-referencing `ImmutableArray` static field causes `TypeLoadException` #104519

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't call fcntl on an invalid file descriptor. #104535
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Report EH clauses to runtime in order of increasing try region index #104531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore type resolution failures when filtering for custom attributes with a sealed type. #104530
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow pushing constants to the right for simd comparisons #104515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use `XmlResolverIsNetworkingEnabledByDefault` property in `AotCompilerCommon.props` #104520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove link to fixed GitHub issue #104521
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Add some helper functions for getting the intrinsic ID to use for a given oper #104498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP] a different way to calculation unusable frag for DATAS #104291
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2490057 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary to avoid threading issues #104407
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix syntax of exports file with no exported symbols on Linux #104339
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators #104506
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in BigInteger.IsPowerOfTwo #104513
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [build.ps1] Set the default architecture using an environment variable #104474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Assertion prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104514
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Fix GatherPrefetch and Prefetch APIs #104494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
